original_text: Jesus said, “Have the people sit down.” There was plenty of grass in that place, and they sat down (about five thousand men were there).
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 이 사람들로 앉게 하라 하시니 그 곳에 잔디가 많은지라 사람들이 앉으니 수가 오천 명쯤 되더라

sentences.original_text: There was plenty of grass in that place
about five thousand men were there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 약 오천 명의 남자가 있었다
